content.question: Which of the following most directly facilitated the conquest alluded to in the passage?

choices.label: Spanish control of the trans-Atlantic slave trade
Spanish advantages over native American populations in terms of technology and disease immunity
The completion of the reconquest of the Iberian Peninsula
The establishment of a cash-crop plantation economy on some of the islands in the in the Atlantic Ocean

content.answer: Spanish advantages over native American populations in terms of technology and disease immunity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
